title: Swedes
summary: Swedes (Swedish: svenskar) are a North Germanic ethnic group native to the Nordic region, primarily their nation state of Sweden,[28][29][30][31][32][33][34] who share a common ancestry, culture, history and language. They mostly inhabit Sweden and the other Nordic countries, in particular Finland,[d] with a substantial diaspora in other countries, especially the United States. Swedes are an officially recognized minority in Finland and Estonia.
